nodes.desc: Get the weather for a specific city and a specific day

parameters.name: location
parameters.desc: The location to get the weather for

parameters.name: date
parameters.desc: The date to get the weather for. The date format should follow the followng: MM-DD.

nodes.desc: Get the news for a specific topic

parameters.name: topic
parameters.desc: The topic to get the news for

nodes.desc: Do a specific operation on a specific stock

parameters.name: stock
parameters.desc: The stock to do the operation on

parameters.name: operation
parameters.desc: The operation to do, eg. buy, sell, short, cover etc.

nodes.desc: Book a flight for a specific date, from a specific location to a specific destination

parameters.name: date
parameters.desc: The date to book the flight for. The date format should follow the followng: MM-DD.

parameters.name: from
parameters.desc: The location to book the flight from

parameters.name: to
parameters.desc: The location to book the flight to

nodes.desc: Book a specific hotel for a specific date

parameters.name: date
parameters.desc: The date to book the hotel for. The date format should follow the followng: MM-DD.

parameters.name: name
parameters.desc: The name of the hotel to book

nodes.desc: Find a hotel in a specific location with a specified check-in date

parameters.name: location
parameters.desc: The location where the hotel is being searched, eg. city or region

parameters.name: check_in
parameters.desc: The check-in date for the hotel in MM-DD format

nodes.desc: Book a specific restaurant for a specific date

parameters.name: date
parameters.desc: The date to book the restaurant for. The date format should follow the followng: MM-DD.

parameters.name: name
parameters.desc: The name of the restaurant to book

nodes.desc: Find restaurants based on cuisine type and location

parameters.name: cuisine
parameters.desc: The type of cuisine to search for, eg. Italian, Korean, Japanese

parameters.name: location
parameters.desc: The location where to search for restaurants, eg. city or neighborhood

nodes.desc: Book a car for a specific date, in a specific location

parameters.name: date
parameters.desc: The date to book the car for. The date format should follow the followng: MM-DD.

parameters.desc: The location to book the car in

nodes.desc: Buy a product from a specific website

nodes.desc: Schedule an appointment for a specific service at a specific location, date, and time

parameters.name: service
parameters.desc: The type of service for the appointment, eg. dentist, doctor, therapist

parameters.name: date
parameters.desc: The date of the appointment in MM-DD format

parameters.name: time
parameters.desc: The time of the appointment in HH:MM format (24-hour clock)

parameters.name: location
parameters.desc: The location where the appointment is scheduled

nodes.desc: Check the balance of a specific account type in a specific currency at a specific bank

parameters.name: currency
parameters.desc: The currency in which the balance is to be displayed, eg. USD, EUR, KRW
